about.title: About Us
about.description: Fast Shipment is an innovative platform connecting travelers with available space to people who need to ship their goods. We aim to provide a fast, safe, and economical shipping solution for everyone.
about.missionText: We strive to transform how goods are shipped globally by utilizing empty spaces in various transportation methods, saving money and time for everyone.
about.visionText: To be the world's leading platform in connecting carriers with shippers, providing safe, reliable, and fast service.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to Fast Shipment. By using this platform, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
terms.section1Text: Fast Shipment is a connection platform only between carriers and shippers. We are not responsible for shipments or transportation. Users are responsible for verifying each other's identity and agreeing on details.
terms.section2Text: Users bear full responsibility for shipment contents and legality. Users must comply with all local and international laws regarding shipping and transportation.
terms.section3Text: Using the platform to ship illegal or dangerous materials is prohibited. We reserve the right to suspend any account violating these terms.
terms.section4Text: We bear no responsibility for any losses or damages resulting from platform use. Transactions occur directly between users.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.section1Text: We collect information you provide during registration such as name, email, and phone number. We also collect information about your platform usage.
privacy.section2Text: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure platform security.
privacy.section3Text: We don't share your personal information with third parties except with your consent or when legally required.
privacy.section4Text: We use advanced security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access.
